events.name: tour.event.route.ready
events.description: Fired when a route's key anchors are present and the page is interactive

events.name: tour.event.auth.started
events.description: Fired when an auth attempt begins

events.name: tour.event.auth.success
events.description: Fired after successful authentication and before redirect

events.name: tour.event.auth.failed
events.description: Fired when auth fails and an error message is shown

events.name: tour.event.modal.opened
events.description: Fired when a tour-relevant modal is opened

events.name: tour.event.modal.closed
events.description: Fired when a tour-relevant modal is closed

events.name: tour.event.studio.generate.started
events.description: Fired when thumbnail generation request starts

events.name: tour.event.studio.generate.complete
events.description: Fired when thumbnail generation completes and results are available

events.name: tour.event.results.updated
events.description: Fired when results grid data updates

events.name: tour.event.onboarding.step.changed
events.description: Fired when onboarding moves between steps
